chara.textHome: I'm always the one holding the camera.

I'm not usually the one
on the other side of the lens.
You should get out of here.

I have a lot of enemies because
I photograph people's bad sides as well.

It's better to stay away before people
think you're associated with me.
So if you're tagging along, be prepared.

I like to get honest,
firsthand accounts for my articles.

But sometimes people won't talk
even after I show them evidence.
When that happens, I start asking around.

When your actions could hurt someone's
reputation, you make a lot of enemies.

But I've also helped a lot of people,
so I actually have a few secret supporters.
The Midori Report will never stop!
It never has, and never will!

With this things are in order for me
to gather ALL the evidence!
Do NOT underestimate me!

Sometimes, I miss a great photo op because
it's beyond my physical capabilities.
I don't want to feel bitter like that ever again.
Ignorance is never bliss.

Even if good and evil are blended together,
the truth can always be found.

Not accepting that fact is unacceptable
to me, even if I am set on bringing out
the truth for my personal satisfaction.
Ah ha ha!
I caught you while your guard was down.

Do you want me to find out
more about your personal life?
Sure, let me take more pictures today.
I wake up early.

No matter how busy I am the night before,
I always need to prep my camera
before school.
Can you hand me that air blower?
Hm?

Oh, it's lunch time, so I was watching people
gather around the newspaper on the wall.
Good crowd today.

Plus no one has tried to
rip the paper up so far.

You're looking for Ryo Midori,
photographer of all things,
clean and dirty? That's me.

I advise you to keep away before
I take any suspicious photos of you.

All right, I've got all my equipment.
I'd better get going.
You don't have to come with me.

After school is the best time for a scoop,
but people don't always like nosy journalists.

Ugh, the stories that break at night
are always weird...
*Sigh*
I'm going to go look for cats.

I haven't posted a photo for
today's Kitty Cat Diary yet.
*Pant* *Pant*
I've finally lost them.
They're so persistent...

If they were going to get that mad,
they shouldn't have been doing
anything shady in the first place!
Oh, I sense a Witch...

That means a Magical Girl is
probably on her way here.
I'll be sure to get a great shot of the battle.
Endless Mirrors...

I've been researching it ever since
I heard about it, but it remains a mystery.
No one's even seen a Witch in there...

Student romance, teacher scandals,
traffic accidents, Magical Girl battles...
If it's a story, it's going in The Midori Report!
Isn't this photo nice?

Cat pictures aren't exactly journalism,
but the photos turn out great.
People like the articles, too.
Owww.

They didn't have to hit me. If they didn't
want their picture taken, they shouldn't
have been doing what they were doing.

They even tried to bribe me,
so I must've struck a nerve.

Drinking black coffee helps me focus
when I'm planning out photos or an article.

Want some?
I don't have any sugar or cream, though.

I know my actions are
undeserving of sympathy...

But it makes me sad when people
make assumptions about where I'm from.
Yeah, I know Kanagi Izumi.

Her arguments are so level-headed,
it's scary.
She is so selfless. I could never be like her.
Ah ha ha! Do you think I have many friends?

There's one person I talk to a lot,
but only in private.

I don't want her getting involved
in anything I'm reporting.

I hate doing favors for other people,
but I don't mind it if it means Magical Girls
will be saved from their fate.

Writing articles for my newspaper
is different, though.
Hey!

That was sneaky of you to
take a picture of me.

It's fine, it's the subject's fault
if a photo gets taken.
Treasure that photo, okay?
This shot's not getting away from me!
This will make a good article.

I've found the evidence!
Now no one can argue with me.

It's your fault for getting caught.
It wouldn't hurt to remember that.
I hope my work is helping people.

The photos I took the other day
were really blurry. I need to train harder.

F-stop and shutter speed are good!
All my photos will be nice and clear!

Ha ha, you want to interview the
photographer? Sure, ask away.

Good and bad have got nothing to do with it.
If I see a photo opportunity, I take it.
It's a talent of mine.
